scripts.build: cd web && pnpm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.dev:web: cd web && pnpm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:js: cd js-server && pnpm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run dev
scripts.prod: pnpm install && cd js-server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run prod
